VEC.Q: How many ring layers are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in this sunburst chart?

SRP.Q: Is Workplace Wellbeing positioned outside, inside or on the same side as Performance Management?
SRP.A: Workplace Wellbeing is positioned {inside} Performance Management.

VPR.A: The top-level category with the highest proportion is {Workplace Wellbeing}.

NF.Q: Which categories in the segment Workplace Wellbeing exceed 100%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Work-Life Balance, Flexible Scheduling, or Employee Development?
NC.A: The value of {Employee Development} is smaller.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Workplace Wellbeing, Work-Life Balance, Flexible Scheduling, or Hybrid Options?
NC.A: The value of {Workplace Wellbeing} is the largest.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Workplace Wellbeing or Work-Life Balance?
NC.A: The value of {Workplace Wellbeing} is larger.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Workplace Wellbeing to Work-Life Balance to Flexible Scheduling to Hybrid Options}.
